participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Reflective and resilient, Michael is determined to overcome his past struggles and seeks to inspire others.
participant_1.background: i'm a 45 year old male. i am a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i now live in the city.

participant_2.name: Rachel
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and energetic, Rachel is passionate about health and wellness, always encouraging others to pursue their best selves.
participant_2.background: i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a cancer survivor. i'm a clean eater. i love running and preparing for marathons.
